It is the highest-performance version of the Model S sedan, with a claimed 0-100 kmph acceleration time of under 2 seconds, making it one of the quickest production cars ever made. The Plaid features three electric motors, producing a combined 1,020 horsepower, and has a range of up to 600km on a single charge. It also boasts an updated interior and exterior design, with a new infotainment system and a futuristic Yoke steering wheel.

    *The prize must be registered in Dubai under the name of the winner only.
